snippet: With labor unrest behind him, DeMaurice Smith enjoyed himself Thursday.
abstract: With labor unrest behind him, DeMaurice Smith enjoyed himself Thursday.
lead_paragraph: INDIANAPOLIS -- DeMaurice Smith, the executive director of the N.F.L. Player's Association, held his organization's annual news conference Thursday afternoon. He smiled often and seemed in the mood to celebrate. This was, of course, far different than last year's version.

headline.main: One Year Later, Different Mood for Union Leader
